thread.title: Ranveer Singh And Farah Khan, Dancing To A Khoon Bhari Maang Song, Look Hilarious
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh And Farah Khan, Dancing To A Khoon Bhari Maang Song, Look Hilarious

title: Ranveer Singh And Farah Khan, Dancing To A Khoon Bhari Maang Song, Look Hilarious
text:
facebook 
Khoon Bhaari Maang has a special place in our Bollywood hearts. Well, looks like Ranveer Singh and Farah Khan, too, share our sentiments. Mr. Singh recently posted a video where the duo's tomfoolery, on a song from the movie, was quite hilarious. Here's the video. Khoon Bhari Maang!!! ðŸ˜®ðŸ’¦@farahkhankunder A post shared by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) on Feb 10, 2017 at 12:32pm PST 
This is precisely what you get when you put the queen of quips, and the king of inexplicable enthusiasm in a single frame. Also, it doesn't hurt that both can dance better than the entire nation put together. Our verdict is that they are hella funny together, and a series of such videos won't be such a lousy idea, after all.
